name: dbt-runner
label: DBT Runner
description: Run dbt (data build tool) projects on Flywheel datasets stored in external storage. Transforms source parquet files using user-defined dbt models and outputs results back to external storage
author: NACC

dbt_project_zip.description: Zip file containing a complete dbt project with dbt_project.yml, profiles.yml, models/, and other dbt files

source_prefixes.description: JSON mapping of local directory names to S3 prefixes containing parquet files.

output_prefix.description: Path prefix within external storage where transformed output tables will be written

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter path prefix for apikey
